Subjects: sermons, verse in; Christ, thanksgivings to; Christ, love toward; advice, spiritual
_description: The four corners of the ‘tapȝte of trewthe’ prepared to receive Christ, in a Latin sermon, Qui custos domini sui gloriabitur, by Friar Nicholas Philip — two couplets

BodLatTheD1.Transcription:
Close þin herte from enwyeNe take noon heede of
                    losengeryeNe lowe non preysyng ne no bosteloke with qwom & qwer
                    þou goste
BodLatTheD1.Editions:
Fletcher,  Alan J. 
             “The Sermon Booklets of Friar Nicholas Philip.” 
             Medium Ævum
         55 (1986): 188-202: 196.
